channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiEDR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiEDR

item.title: CVE-2022-29057|2024-10-22T20:55:20.971Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiedr
item.description: A improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('cross-site scripting') in Fortinet FortiEDR version 5.1.0, 5.0.0 through 5.0.3 Patch 6 and 4.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to perform a reflected cross site scripting attack (XSS) by injecting malicious payload into the Management Console via various endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2022-39949|2024-10-22T20:52:28.614Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiedr
item.description: An improper control of a resource through its lifetime vulnerability [CWE-664] in FortiEDR CollectorWindows 4.0.0 through 4.1, 5.0.0 through 5.0.3.751, 5.1.0 may allow a privileged user to terminate the FortiEDR processes with special tools and bypass the EDR protection.
